channel.title: Frag Dolls UK: Gaming Audio Features
channel.itunes:subtitle: Video gaming audio features
channel.itunes:summary: Video gaming audio features by the UK Frag Dolls - Jam, Kitt and Sarin. Including developer interviews, Desert Island Discs, and episodes of Afternoon Tea - the regular show filled with gaming news, scorewhoring confessions and more.
channel.itunes:author: Frag Dolls

item.title: Afternoon Tea with the Frag Dolls Episode Eight - Sarin and Kitt
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Having found a new Internet connection that makes her sound less like she's trapped in a pipe, Sarin returns to Afternoon Tea. However, in a shockingly ironic turn of events, a broken headset leaves Kitt sounding like [i]she[/i]'s trapped in a pipe. Still, the ladies don't let it get in the way of them discussing the Games Media Awards, Will Wright, the wonders of The Orange Box, and Imagine Happy Cooking.

item.title: Afternoon Tea with the Frag Dolls Episode Seven - Kitt, Jam and Psyche
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Afternoon Tea goes international with American Frag Lady Psyche joining Kitt and Jam to discuss PAX, Leipzig, EIF and boob cups. Games covered include Bioshock, Metropolismania 2, CoD4, Streets of Rage 2, Guitar Hero 3, Super Puzzle Fighter HD and Manhunt 2.

item.title: Afternoon Tea with the Frag Dolls Episode Six - Kitt and Jam
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Afternoon Tea returns again with the ladies talking about the PS3 (non)pricecut, Peter Moore's move to EA Sports, the XNA contest, scorewhoring, Wartech: Senko no Ronde, how hot Gregory Peck used to be, Harry bloomin' Potter, Tomb Raider Legend and Nintendo DS games with `Puzzle` in the title.

item.title: Afternoon Tea with the Frag Dolls Episode Five - Kitt and Jam
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Afternoon Tea is back, with the ladies previewing Ubi Days, whether Real Time Strategy games work on console, the Halo 3 beta, score whoring (shock horror) and the summer.

item.title: Jam talks to Christan Allen - Multiplayer Creative Director on GRAW2
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: GRAW2 multiplayer creative director Christian Allen, aka the Nicest Man In Gaming, takes time out from GDC to talk multiplayer with Jam.

item.title: Video Games Live - Jam talks to Tommy Tallarico and Jack Wall
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Jam talks to composers and Video Games Live founders Tommy Tallarico and Jack Wall ahead of VGLs first ever London performance on the 25th November.

item.title: The second part of Kitt's chat with the legendary Charles Cecil
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Kitt talks to her hero, the wondeful Charles Cecil, the mind behind the Broken Sword series. In this second part of the interview, they discuss Broken Sword 4, monatomic gold and the future.

item.title: Afternoon Tea with the Frag Dolls Episode Four - Kitt and Jam
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: It's the fourth. A little late with posting this one, which was recorded about a week ago. Talk of EIEF, GC, and various other things best known by their letters (because they have stupid real names).

item.title: Desert Island Disks - Iain Lee
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: In the first of a new feature, Jam talks to TV and radio presenter Iain Lee about the five games he'd want to be left with if stranded on a desert island.

item.title: Afternoon Tea with the Frag Dolls Episode Three - Kitt, Jam and Sarin
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: It's the third one. Sarin's back in the Frag Lady fold, Kitt's been stealing 12 years old boys off the street, and Jam's been vomitting on her trainers. Possibly.

item.title: Afternoon Tea with the Frag Dolls Episode Two - Kitt and Jam
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: It's the second one. This time Kitt and Jam have a chat about Chromehounds, Prey, Phoenix Wright, more score whoring, Discworld 1, Frogger, Cloning Clyde, Xbox Live Arcade and recruiting new Frag Ladies. Phew.

item.title: Semi-Regular Podcast Episode One - Kitt and Jam
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: In the first of our new semi-regular podcast series, Kitt and Jam have a chat about what they've been up to lately, and what's going on in gaming. PS2 Online, the DLC cost question, the WiG conference, an SCDA multiplayer event, a bit of shameless score-whoring, and the Prey and Chromehounds demos on Live.

item.title: Jam talks to Prince Arrington - Associate Producer on the GRAW Chapter 2 DLC
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Jam talks to Prince Arrington about what fans can expect to find in the new GRAW Xbox 360 downloadable content

item.title: [E3] Sarin talks to Max Beland - Lead Game Designer on Rainbow Six Vegas
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Sarin talks to Max Beland about why Rainbow Six is heading to Vegas, and how the series is returning to its roots.

item.title: [E3] Jam talks to Chris Smith - Designer on Splinter Cell Double Agent Xbox 360
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Jam talks to Chris Smith about planning for E3 and how the game has progressed in the six months since she spoke to him last.

item.title: Battle of the Dolls podcast #3
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Hear how the recruitment sessions went, who made the final teams, and what'll happen in the practice session.

item.title: Jam talks to Ben Gunstone - Senior Producer at Sega on Outrun Coast 2 Coast
item.itunes:author: Frag Dolls UK
item.itunes:summary: Jam has a chat with Ben Gunstone about the new Outrun game and how Outrun still fits into the modern driving genre.

item.title: Battle of the Dolls podcast #1
item.itunes:author: Jam
item.itunes:summary: Jam and Terrence Babyhorse III explain the recruitment phase of exciting new prize tournament Battle of the Dolls!

item.title: Sarin talks to Tony Van - Executive Producer on CSI 3 Dimensions of Murder
item.itunes:author: Sarin
item.itunes:summary: Sarin catches a word with Tony Van about cranking CSI up a notch, bringing it into 3D, and working with Telltale games.

item.title: Jam talks to Chris Smith - Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell Double Agent next-gen single-player game designer
item.itunes:author: Jam
item.itunes:summary: Jam chats to Chris Smith about bringing Sam Fisher to next-gen, how to change a series without breaking it, and what Double Agent will bring to the Splinter Cell party.

item.title: Kitt talks to Ben Mattes - Prince of Persia The Two Thrones producer
item.itunes:author: Kitt
item.itunes:summary: Kitt chats to super-enthusiastic Ben Mattes about bringing together the story strands of Warrior Within and Sands of Time into a satisfying finale for the Prince of Persia series.

item.title: Kitt talks to Paulina Bozek - Singstar producer
item.itunes:author: Kitt
item.itunes:summary: Kitt chats to Paulina Bozek, Senior Producer at SCEE, about her BAFTA award-winning work on the Singstar series. Topics covered include the future of the series, why 60 percent of Singstar players are female, and what it's like to sing The Darkness with Beyonce (!)

item.title: Kitt talks to Michel Ancel - King Kong game Creative Director
item.itunes:author: Kitt
item.itunes:summary: Michel Ancel talks to Kitt during the King Kong game launch event. Topics covered include what makes the Kong story so interesting, how Michel got into game development, and whether there will be a Beyond Good & Evil 2.

item.title: Jam talks to Colonel Antal (US Army ret.) - Brothers in Arms technical advisor
item.itunes:author: Jam
item.itunes:summary: Colonel Antal (US Army ret.) takes time out from producing the History Channel Brothers in Arms film in Normandy to talk to Jam. Topics covered include the Colonel's military history, and the morality of representing real wars in video games.
